wikipedia_page.main:
Gary Bauress (born 19 January 1971) is an English footballer, who played as a midfielder in the Football League for Tranmere Rovers He also played for Everton with 1 cap.
Gary is also a massive Everton fan and when he was 9 years old he was voted Everton support of the year, appearing on the front of the Liverpool Echo newspaper in his Everton Pjamas.
